'''Deeping-road''' was a short road which diverged from the main horse-road (the [[Great Road]]) to the north from [[Helm's Deep]] and led from there to the [[Deeping-coomb]] and [[Hornburg]].<ref>{{UT|11}}</ref> The road is marked in [[The West of Middle-earth at the End of the Third Age]] as a short stretch from north-east to south-west but without a name.<ref>{{FR|Map}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2013: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Deeping-road splits from the [[Great West Road]] at the village of "Marton" and runs south towards [[Helm's Deep]].
